name: miniswap
description: Miniature Bitswap implementation, remote read only.

scripts.gen: npm run gen:proto && npm run gen:proto-types
scripts.gen:proto: pbjs -t static-module -w es6 -r miniswap --force-number --no-verify --no-delimited --no-create --no-beautify --no-defaults --lint eslint-disable -o gen/message.js message.proto

author: Alan Shaw
